entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023
